trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> uses its own journal.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> utilizza il proprio journal.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership> is Automatic, the following behavior applies:
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership> sia impostato su automatico, si applica il comportamento seguente:

trans-unit.source: The hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> behaves as though UsesParentJournal was set if it is hosted by either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> or a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: Hosting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> si comporta come se UsesParentJournal è stata impostata se è ospitato da uno un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: The hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> behaves as though OwnsJournal was set if:
trans-unit.target: Hosting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> si comporta come se fosse impostato OwnsJournal se:

trans-unit.source: It is not directly hosted by either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: Non è ospitato direttamente tramite un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: It is hosted by at least one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, where each containing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property is set to UsesParentJournal.
trans-unit.target: È ospitato da almeno uno <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, dove ognuno dei quali contiene <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> è relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> proprietà è impostata su UsesParentJournal.

trans-unit.source: once a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> creates its own journal, switching to Automatic has no effect.
trans-unit.target: una volta un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> crea il proprio journal, passaggio automatico non ha alcun effetto.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> yielding journal management to a host <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> cede il controllo journal di gestione a un host <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: Whether or not this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> will create and use its own journal depends on its parent.
trans-unit.target: La creazione e l'utilizzo del proprio journal da parte dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> dipende dall'oggetto padre.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> maintains its own journal.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> mantiene il proprio journal.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> uses the journal of the next available navigation host up the content tree, if available.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> utilizza il journal dell'host di navigazione successivo al livello superiore della struttura ad albero del contenuto, se disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, navigation history is not maintained for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, la cronologia di navigazione per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> non verrà mantenuta.
